entry.title: Sunbrella Chakra Neutral Textured Stripe Outdoor Fabric
entry.summary:
Vendor: CF Stinson
Type: Outdoor Fabric
Price: 1.00 - 22.25 (2 variants)

Description

Create a fresh new look a Sunbrella stain and fade resistant light gray fabric for upholstery. A durable fabric that can be used in or ourdoors.

  • Summary
  • Details
Fabric Name Chakra Neutral
ID Number FF 64049-0005
Color Gray
Width 54"
Pattern Repeat 13.38” Horizontal, 0” Vertical
Fiber Contents 63% Sunbrella® Acrylic, 37% Sunbrella® Polyester
Vendor CF Stinson
Finish: Enhanced Soil And Stain Protection
Backing: -
Fire Codes: California Technical Bulletin 117-2013, Section 1, Ufac Class 1, Nfpa 260 Class 1
Abrasion: 97,500
Cleaning: WS: For water based stains use water based cleaning agents only, do not use solvents. For oil based stains use solvent cleaners only. Bleach solutions of up to 20% may be used for cleaning difficult stains.
Additional Information: Collection: Sarana. Designer: Clodagh. Weight: 14.6 oz/ly. Meets or exceeds ACT certification marks in heavy duty abrasion (ASTM D-4157), colorfastness to light (AATCC-16E, 2000 Hours, Class 4), flammability, wet and dry crocking (AATCC-8 Class 5), and physical properties (Break Strength ASTM D-5034, Tear Strength ASTM D-2261, Seam Slippage ASTM D-4034, Brush Pilling ASTM D-3511 Class 4.5). Facts™ Silver Certification. Facts certification indicates that this textile has been evaluated and met environmental, economic and social standards across its life cycle. Greenguard and Greenguard Gold Certified: This textile is certified for low chemical emissions ULCOM/GG UL 2878.
